steps.title: Task Switch
steps.measurements: How quickly you can alternate between two tasks.
steps.yourObjective: Determine whether the number is high/low, or odd/even .
steps.instructions:
You will be presented a blue box with a number inside it. Your task is to decide whether or not the number is HIGHER or LOWER than the number 5.

Next you will be presented a pink box with a number inside it. Your task is to decide whether the number presented is ODD or EVEN.

Last activity you will be asked to switch between the two previous tasks.
